alert.note: Alert for Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 24 at 3:20AM MST until December 24 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 6 to 18 inches. Winds gusting as high as 80 mph. * WHERE...Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Feet. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Very strong winds could cause power outages.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Ft
